dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com(URLS)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, September 14, 2006 4:50 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com(URLS)
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com(URLS)


The Planet,

I apologize for the delay in returning your message.  Here are the
specific URLs that are infringing.  Please contact me with any
additional questions that you may have.  


http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-nissan-skyline-p-1729.html?manuf
acturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-nissan-skyline-p-1729.html?manuf
acturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-nissan-240sx-8994-p-1754.html?ma
nufacturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-nissan-240sx-9598-p-1755.html?ma
nufacturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-infiniti-coupe-sedan-p-1721.html
?manufacturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-toyota-0004-p-1749.html?manufact
urers_id=13

 Thank you,

Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

-----Original Message-----
From: Legal Response [mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com]
Sent: Monday, September 11, 2006 1:34 PM
To: Victor Tarver
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com

 Please provide us with the specific URLs which is infringing upon your
customer's copyright.

Thank you for working with us.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] Posted At: Monday,
September 11, 2006 10:22 AM Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com



To Whom It May Concern:

Thank you for removing all of TEIN logos and copyrighted images from the
urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the copyrighted
images and/or trademarked logos of TEIN needs to be removed from your
entire website. This case will remain open until this request is
satisfied in full.  If you should need any further assistance in
reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my best to provide
you with the needed information.  

Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter,


Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2006 11:31 AM
To: Victor Tarver; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers TEIN nyxracing.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] Posted At:
Wednesday, August 30, 2006 9:42 AM Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: TEIN ISP Infringement Notification
Subject: TEIN ISP Infringement Notification


Ellis & Venable

A Partnership of Professional Organizations

Attorneys and Counselors at Law

www.ellisvenable.com

 

8/31/2006
  

7006 0810 0005 4495 7268 

                                               

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons PwySte 110

Dallas,TX 75207

Re:      Unauthorized Use of  TEIN???S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted
Materials

 

Dear Sir or Madame:

            This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
?? 512 (c)(3)(A) of unauthorized use of copyrighted material of TEIN,
Inc. (???TEIN???) (such copyrighted material is referred to as ???TEIN
Works???) by your client, nyxracing.com, at the URL www.nyxracing.com.
TEIN has a good faith belief that use of the Infringing Material by your
client is not authorized by TEIN, its agents, or the law.  The
information contained in this letter is accurate, and under the penalty
of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of TEIN.  

 

            The specific works, graphics or other material TEIN believes
to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the
???Infringing Material???) are copyrighted images from TEIN???s website.
Specific violations of copyrighted images by nyxracing.com are listed
below this paragraph.

 

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-coilovers-330i-0004-mounts-p-1750.html?man
ufacturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-basic-damper-scion-p-4929.html?manufacture
rs_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-flex-coilovers-nissan-240sx-9598-p-1739.ht
ml?manufacturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-flex-coilovers-nissan-300zx-9096-p-1740.ht
ml?manufacturers_id=13

http://www.nyxracing.com/tein-flex-coilovers-mazda-9395-p-1737.html?manu
facturers_id=13

 

            Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. ??
512(c)(1)(C), TEIN hereby demands that you remove or disable access to
the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner.  

 

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance
Management Department via facsimile to 501-646-6242, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in
writing, but if you need to contact Net Enforcers directly, you can
contact them at 501-646-6242.   Net Enforcers is authorized to handle
and resolve this matter with you and is involved with this case.  Calls
directly to TEIN will not be accepted.  If your designated agent or
representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m.
on 9/11/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and
proceed accordingly.

 

Sincerely,

Ellis & Venable



Lance C. Venable

Attorney at Law

 

LCV/roc
